.exit
npx hardhat run .\scripts\seed-and-play.js --network shido
await coin.play(true, { value: ethers.parseEther("0.001") });
await me.sendTransaction({ to: await coin.getAddress(), value: ethers.parseEther("0.25") });
const coin = await ethers.getContractAt("CoinFlip", "PASTE_COINFLIP_ADDRESS");
const [me] = await ethers.getSigners();
